transactions.details: San Francisco Giantsplaced RHPLanden Rouppon the 15-day injured list retroactive to August 21, 2025. Left knee inflammation.
Colorado Rockiesplaced RHPDugan Darnellon the 15-day injured list. Left hip inflammation.
Colorado Rockiesselected the contract of LHPLucas Gilbreathfrom Albuquerque Isotopes.
Cincinnati Redsselected the contract of RHPZach Maxwellfrom Louisville Bats.
Colorado Rockiesrecalled RHPAngel Chivillifrom Albuquerque Isotopes.
San Francisco Giantsrecalled LHPCarson Whisenhuntfrom Sacramento River Cats.
